abstract: Sanofi intends to add a few dollars a share to its $69-a-share offer, and will likely allow for additional payments to Genzyme shareholders if one of the company’s drugs hits certain sales expectations.
snippet: Sanofi intends to add a few dollars a share to its $69-a-share offer, and will likely allow for additional payments to Genzyme shareholders if one of the company’s drugs hits certain sales expectations.
lead_paragraph: Sanofi-Aventis plans to raise its takeover bid for Genzyme by several dollars a share, in an effort to clinch a deal for the biopharmaceutical company, people briefed on the matter told DealBook on Tuesday.

headline.main: Sanofi Plans to Raise Genzyme Bid

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
